channel.title: Find on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Find on TLDRBins

item.title: Find
item.description: Locate a file locate cmd.php Find files of type file find . -type f Find and Open find / -name test.txt -exec cat {} \; Find SUID bit set files find / -type f -user root \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) 2>/dev/null -ls Find files owned by user find / -user user -ls 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e " \/proc" -e " \/sys" Find files owned by group find / -group adm 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e ^/proc Find files created between 1/1/2024 and 31/12/2024 find / -type f -newermt 2024-01-01 !

item.title: Find (Windows)
item.description: Show hidden files Get-ChildItem -force Find a file ls -path \Users -Filter example.txt -recurse -erroraction silent where /R C:\Users example.txt Find a file, with rules dir /s /b /a:-d-h \Users\Administrator | findstr /i /v "appdata" +---------------------------------------+ |dir: | |/s : include subfolders | |/b : bare format | |/a:-d-h : exclude directories or hidden| | | |findstr: | |/i : case insensitive | |/v appdata : exclude 'appdata' | +---------------------------------------+
